landing.transformHome: Transform your home into a thriving plant paradise with our intelligent monitoring system and personalized care recommendations.
landing.comprehensiveSystem: Our comprehensive plant monitoring system gives you all the tools to ensure your plants thrive in any environment.
landing.testimonialDescription: Hear what our community is saying about how PlantSmart has transformed their plant care experience.
landing.readyToTransform: Ready to transform your plant care?
landing.joinThousands: Join thousands of plant lovers who've already made their plants happier and healthier with PlantSmart.
landing.futurePlantCare: The future of plant care, today. Smart monitoring for happier, healthier plants.

features.smartWateringDesc: Our sensors monitor soil moisture and automatically water your plants at the perfect time, ensuring they're never over or under-watered.
features.lightOptimizationDesc: Track light exposure throughout the day and receive recommendations on optimal placement for each of your plants' specific needs.
features.healthAlertsDesc: Get instant notifications about potential health issues, pests, or diseases before they become serious problems.

help.title: Help Center
help.tryDifferent: Try a different search term or browse categories below

setup.title: How do I set up my first device?
setup.content: To set up your first device, navigate to the Devices section after logging in. Click 'Add New Device' and follow the on-screen instructions to connect your device to your WiFi network. The setup typically takes less than 5 minutes.

pairing.title: My sensor won't pair with the app
pairing.content: If your sensor won't pair, try the following: 1) Make sure your sensor is charged and the LED is blinking, 2) Ensure your phone's Bluetooth is enabled, 3) Place the sensor closer to your phone during pairing, 4) Restart the sensor by removing and reinserting the battery.

watering.title: How does automatic watering work?
watering.content: Automatic watering uses soil moisture sensors to detect when your plant needs water. When moisture falls below the threshold you set, the system will activate the connected water pump for a specified duration. You can customize thresholds and watering duration for each plant in the Plant Settings.

accuracy.title: How accurate are the moisture readings?
accuracy.content: Our soil moisture sensors are accurate to within ±3% in normal conditions. For best results, place the sensor probe at least 2 inches into the soil and away from the pot's edge. Calibration may be needed for certain soil types, which you can perform in the sensor settings.

battery.title: How long does the sensor battery last?
battery.content: Standard sensor batteries last 6-12 months with normal use. Premium sensors with solar recharging can last significantly longer. You'll receive a notification when battery levels are low. To preserve battery life, reduce the reading frequency in sensor settings.

offline.title: What happens if my internet goes offline?
offline.content: If your internet connection is lost, sensors will continue to collect data locally (up to 7 days of storage). The automatic watering system will continue to function based on the last settings. Once connection is restored, all stored data will sync to your account.

plantTypes.title: Does the system work for all plant types?
plantTypes.content: Yes, our system works with virtually all indoor and outdoor plants. The database includes specific care information for over 5,000 plant species. For specialized plants with unique requirements, you can manually adjust thresholds and settings.

subscription.title: What's included in the premium subscription?
subscription.content: Premium subscription includes: AI-powered plant disease detection, unlimited plants and sensors, advanced analytics with historical data, custom care schedules, expert advice access, and priority customer support. View our Pricing page for a detailed comparison.

refunds.title: What is your refund policy?
refunds.content: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee for hardware purchases. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a return authorization. For subscriptions, you can cancel anytime and will not be charged for the next billing cycle, but we do not provide partial refunds for unused subscription time.

dataPrivacy.title: How is my plant data used?
dataPrivacy.content: Your plant data is used to provide personalized care recommendations and improve our service. We anonymize data for research and analysis purposes. We never sell your personal information to third parties. See our Privacy Policy for complete details.

premium.title: Upgrade to Premium
premium.description: Unlock advanced features and get the most from your plant monitoring system

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.cancelAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your Premium features will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
faq.deviceAnswer: No, Premium works with all existing PlantSmart sensors and devices. You'll immediately gain access to new features with your current setup.
faq.trialQuestion: What happens after the free trial?
faq.trialAnswer: After your 14-day trial ends, you'll be automatically subscribed to the Premium plan. We'll send a reminder before charging your payment method.
faq.refundAnswer: We don't offer refunds for partial subscription periods, but you can cancel anytime to avoid future charges.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.frequencyHint: More frequent readings use more battery power
